definition.value: 1 H(2)O + 1 L-histidinol + 2 NAD(+) => 2 H(+) + 1 L-histidine + 2 NADH.
(2S,4S)-4-hydroxy-2,3,4,5-tetrahydrodipicolinate + H(+) + [NADH or NADPH] => (S)-tetrahydrodipicolinate + H(2)O + [NAD(+) or NADP(+)].
1 (S)-tetrahydrodipicolinate + 1 H(+) + 1 H(2)O + 1 NADPH + 1 NH(3) => 1 DL-2,6-diaminopimelate + 1 NADP(+).
1 ATP + 1 H(+) + 1 L-alpha-aminoadipate + 1 NADPH => 1 AMP + 1 L-2-aminoadipate 6-semialdahyde + 1 NADP(+) + 1 diphosphate + 1 holo-Lys2.
1 H(+) + 1 L-2-aminoadipate 6-semialdahyde + 1 L-glutamate + 1 NADPH => 1 H(2)O + 1 NADP(+) + 1 saccharopine.
1 H(2)O + 1 NAD(+) + 1 saccharopine => 1 2-oxoglutarate + 1 H(+) + 1 L-lysine + 1 NADH.
1 L-glutamine + 1 NH(3) + 1 chorismate => 1 L-glutamate + 1 anthranilate + 1 pyruvate.
1 L-serine + 1 indoleglycerol phosphate => 1 D-glyceraldehyde 3-phosphate + 1 H(2)O + 1 L-tryptophan.
H(+) + L-aspartate 4-semialdehyde + [NADH or NADPH] => L-homoserine + [NAD(+) or NADP(+)].
1 D-erythro-3-methylmalic acid + 1 NAD(+) => 1 2-oxobutanoate + 1 CO(2) + 1 H(+) + 1 NADH.
